IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.external_file_formats WHERE name = 'SynapseParquetFormat') 
	CREATE EXTERNAL FILE FORMAT [SynapseParquetFormat] 
	WITH ( FORMAT_TYPE = PARQUET)
GO

-- parameters('your_make_belive') this is just a test.

IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.external_data_sources WHERE name = 'gold_factories') 
	CREATE EXTERNAL DATA SOURCE [gold_factories] 
	WITH (
		LOCATION = 'abfss://gold@parameters('your_lake_storage').dfs.core.windows.net' 
	)
GO

-- Create a table to be used by power bi, the simple query is used just as reference - you can create any SQL query here

CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE sampletable1
    WITH (
        LOCATION = 'sampletable1/',  
        DATA_SOURCE = [gold_factories],
        FILE_FORMAT = [SynapseParquetFormat]  
)
    AS 
	select * 
	FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://parameters('your_lake_storage').dfs.core.windows.net/silver/factory=parameters('factory_number')/**',
        FORMAT = 'PARQUET'
    ) AS [result]


select count(*) from sampletable1
